replies.name: Recently in March '23
replies.content: March is almost gone and here we are again, at one more recap of what has happened over the last month. Compared to February, March has been a pretty eventless month, at least on the surface.âœï¸ WebsiteVery little has happened on this website since last month. I had many articles - and still do - in my drafts, but havenâ€™t had the time, or want, to get back to them. However, I wrote an article about the time I â€œhackedâ€ my high schoolâ€™s library computers.Writing that article reminded me that I have always been somewhat interested in security, but never did much about it. At my bachelorâ€™s university there was a security club and I almost decided to join. Sadly, I didnâ€™t. Now, I decided to join TryHackMe. I hope I can learn a few nice things, mostly related to networking.ğŸ„ LifeAs I stated previously, it was a very eventless month. I went to physiotherapy once, I joined a gym - yey - where I am now getting some 1:1 guidance. I decided to do this mostly because of my foot, to help my recovery. Iâ€™m much better than before, but there is still a long way before it feels 100%. With this, I also want to become stronger and just more active. Sadly, itâ€™s hard for me to keep this kind of habits. Having someone telling me what to do at a specific day and time is perfect. Maybe in the future Iâ€™ll be able to understand more how everything works and be able to decide by myself which exercises to do.At home, we hang some shelves, bought some more plants and weâ€™re now thinking about the balcony. The weather ğŸŒ is becoming slightly nicer so itâ€™d be great to have at least some form of sitting in the balcony. I also printed some pictures and hanged them. I think I will want to share that in a separate post though.ğŸ¿ WatchingWe watched â€œThe Witcher: Blood Originâ€ and the first season of â€œThe Last of Usâ€. Both interesting, in different ways. I must confess that â€œThe Last of Usâ€ made me feel a bit uncomfortable and scared due to the topic, but Iâ€™ll definitely watch season two.ğŸ® GamingWell, I finished the main story of â€œHogwarts Legacyâ€, but havenâ€™t played much this much in general. I would like to fully complete the game, but Iâ€™ve been pretty busy with work and some other things, such as trying to learn Dutch and other online courses.That was it, March is almost gone! I hope you had a great March and wish you the best April! ğŸ˜Š
